arts.instruction: This is an experiment to try to recreate a form of the Musee des Beaux Arts interface from the NYTimes.  Each presentation is configured using a JSON document, like the one shown to the right
You can put images, on the right, that correspond with snippets of text on the left
You can also zoom in, on an image already displayed
Right now, the transitions between images are flipping rather than scrolling-type transitions, but I'm going to try and fix that
I'm also trying to experiment with supporting other types of content in the pane on the right
